name: MADE_EEG_Pipeline
author: Child Development Lab, University of Maryland
description: The Maryland Analysis of Developmental EEG (MADE) Pipeline is an EEG pipeline that (in this form) takes a BIDS-EEG directory structure with '*.set' files as input.

inputs.description: The study-wide BIDS directory. In CBRAIN this is also referred to (and used) as the subject directory since a new BIDS dir will be made for the selected subject prior to processing.
inputs.name: Subject Directory

inputs.description: The name of the output directory to store outcomes of preprocessing and reports. When processing is ran via CBRAIN only subject-specific files/folders will be saved, so the naming of the output folder will not influence the final naming/destination of files/folders.
inputs.name: MADE Output Directory

inputs.description: The json file with settings to configure processing
inputs.name: JSON Settings

inputs.description: Space delimited list of subjects to be processed (with or without sub- prefix)
inputs.name: Participant Label

inputs.description: select a specific session to be processed (with or without ses- prefix)
inputs.name: Session Label

inputs.description: The type of eeg to file to be processed (only .set for now)
inputs.name: File Extension

output-files.name: Output Directory
output-files.description: This is the directory where the overall outputs are to be stored.
